# use db
"use ks"
{
  "QueryType": "USE",
  "Original": "use ks",
  "Instructions": {
    "OperatorType": "UpdateTarget",
    "target": "ks"
  }
}

# use db tablet
"use ks@replica"
{
  "QueryType": "USE",
  "Original": "use ks@replica",
  "Instructions": {
    "OperatorType": "UpdateTarget",
    "target": "ks@replica"
  }
}

# use db target with :
"use `ks:-80@replica`"
{
  "QueryType": "USE",
  "Original": "use `ks:-80@replica`",
  "Instructions": {
    "OperatorType": "UpdateTarget",
    "target": "ks:-80@replica"
  }
}

# use db target with /
"use `ks/80-@replica`"
{
  "QueryType": "USE",
  "Original": "use `ks/80-@replica`",
  "Instructions": {
    "OperatorType": "UpdateTarget",
    "target": "ks/80-@replica"
  }
}

# reset db
"use"
{
  "QueryType": "USE",
  "Original": "use",
  "Instructions": {
    "OperatorType": "UpdateTarget"
  }
}
